item.title: setup hugo with github pages on github
item.description: I followed this site for setting up hugo blogging on https://github.com/ using github.io, the instruction is little bit confusion, so just to clarify a little bit here. the instructions there uses gh-pages branch to publish your site, this is done by the action peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3. however, for user/organization.github.io pages, the default branch for publishing is main. so if you use this action, you need to change your page branch to gh-pages and set the directory to /root.
